title: Italian Stallion, Pen Pal, Hope, and LOL
teaser:
In this hour, hear how celebrated author and writer Adam Gopnik (Paris to the Moon, The New Yorker) embarrasses his son and offends other loved ones by getting lost in the new world of instant message abbreviations. Also, the story of a first kiss and beyond from a disabled woman; a pair of unlikely pen pals; and the sad tale of a gay man who comes out to his parents with dramatic consequences. Lea Thau hosts.

Note: some stories are emotionally intense and not for children.
description: Jeffery Rudell – “Under the Influence”: About the unsatisfied hope for understanding when coming out to his parents.  Adam Gopnik – “LOL”: A parent learns the hidden meaning of instant messages.  Janice Bartley – “Italian Stallion”: The thrill and complications of first love.    Boris Timanovsky – “Pen Pal”: A transatlantic pen pal adventure.    Hosted by Lea Thau.
